Concept Reply GmbH | Embedded Software Engineer | Munich, Germany | Full-Time | Onsite | Visa

We are a small team of engineers doing projects for automotive companies. Nowadays we are busy developing and supporting software for carsharing modules, we use C++11 mostly, but also hardware, embedded Linux, AutoSAR knowledge is really useful.

To give you an example of our present day to day activity: we are evaluating bluetooth stacks and implementing network functionality over BR/EDR as well as BLE, we are working with LIN communication and multiplexing protocol buffer based messages between two channels and there are tasks for bring up of a platform another hardware team is developing.

Workflow is agile, team is international, we have backend developers team as well. Now we are looking for additional software engineers. To give you several keywords: real time sw (realtime OSes, embedded linux, application layer), C++, C, assembler, python, communication buses and protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, LIN). Good to have would be also knowledge of HW design(PCB, HW debug), embedded profiling and debugging (PMU, JTAG etc), specific Linux distributions (Android, Yocto), understanding of test code coverage, reading proficiency in German.

If you're interested don't hesitate to contact me at d.nikitenkov@reply.de

See our linkedin page here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/concept-reply/
